ovdesc.p:
Live file used to record the FATCA status condition changes done in file FATCA.STATUS.CONDITION.
This changes information is required in close of business, to reclassify the FATCA status, when AUTO.STATUS.UPDATE is set as “YES” in FATCA.PARAMETER.

desc.p: The following values will be updated by the system based on the changes done on the status condition,
ADD – When a new status condition is added or restored.
DEL- When a status condition record is reversed.
CHG – When a status condition record is amended.
The STATUS.ID and FUNCTION are associated multi-value fields.
Updates the date on which the status condition record is amended.
Updates the record id of status condition.
A valid record available in the FATCA.STATUS.CONDITION table. The STATUS.ID and FUNCTION are associated multi-value fields.
